experience: You and Steven both know Boyan Josic, Monte Cahn, and 50 others

NameSummit 2017 is bringing the best of the entrepreneurial and digital branding worlds to share their expertise in establishing a digital presence that excites, inspires, and generates ROI. Building a digital brand — from domain name selection and market analysis, to creating a comprehensive web presence — requires stamina, strategy, and constant attention to trends. NameSummit 2017’s digital branding and domain industry leaders are here to show beginners and pros how to bring their businesses to market, capture customer engagement, and keep them connected.

New York Media is a network of enterprises that have been developed over the past 13 years. The company’s main concentration is in developing and operating pure New York Geo targeted websites utilizing premium domain names. Their business partners experience local, regional and global exposures through their network of local geographical communities. New York Media operates several enterprises including YourBrand.com, CityPartners.com, HelloNYC.com, NameDiscover.com, RealtyBranding.com, MortgageBranding.com and a handful more. New York Media is also a co-founder of NameSummit.com.

MortgageDepot is one of the largest privately owned mortgage brokerages in the State of New York. As experts in the non-conforming and commercial loan market we excel in helping borrowers achieve their mortgage goals. Our loan product portfolio surpasses that of any of our competitors, as well as our expertise in Internet marketing allowing us to take the lead in the contemporary Mortgage Finance industry.

At YourBrand.com, we're pioneers and innovators in the field of domain name acquisition and sales. We own an incomparable portfolio of quality, brandable domain names that we make available for sale or lease to startups, existing businesses and entrepreneurs in order to help market their products, services, apps, websites and blogs. We offer .com and .nyc extensions, and each domain name in our constantly expanding portfolio has been carefully selected by our expert team to offer the greatest possible brandability and originality.

CityPartners a firm that reaches local and global customers through Geographically domain name advertising solutions. Our exclusive advertising solutions are a cost-effective alternative over traditional media and current web marketing campaigns. Pure Geo targeted domain names offer a focused approach at creating a local presence with a global reach.
Local Advertising - Community Advertising - Neighborhood Advertising - CityPartners.com
Local Advertising - Community Advertising - Neighborhood Advertising - CityPartners.com

At PrivateClients.com we bring a wealth of entrepreneurial and personal experiences needed to meet discerning requirements. We understand the importance you place on your limited time; as such we will handle the multitude of details in a professional and efficient manner. More to the point, as our Private Client, we will handle the following:      - Access to virtually any event throughout the world.    - Connections to a vast array of charitable events and the causes they support.    - Introductions to many of the local celebrity chefs for your personal entertaining needs.    - Personal introduction and private meeting with a pre-eminent international jeweler.    - Introductions to private banking services.    - Introductions to skilled public relations specialists.    - Securing vacation home properties throughout the world.    - Negotiations for either the purchase or sale of your Real Estate holdings.    - Provide High-End mortgage financing with loan amounts up to $100 Million.    - Private plane, boat, and car arrangements for both personal and business needs.    - Specific lifestyle recommendations to help you settle into your community such as:          Interior designers - Remodel and new build services - Home theater and electronics specialists          Personal chefs - Event planners, etc. The list can be almost endless.Finally, and most important, we respect the value you place on privacy and confidentiality. You’ve sacrificed and worked hard to achieve your place in the world; and the limited private time you have is of great importance. In many cases your needs and goals can be arranged to secure your anonymity. At PrivateClients.com we will be unwavering in protecting and respecting that confidentiality.

Founder and Partner at a leading New York Mortgage Brokerage firm specializing in lead gen and companies website SEO. Our business has grown tremendously in the past few years thanks to internet marketing. Lead gen is a big part of our everyday business model as we continue to expand our internet presence on a daily basis. Our mortgage web presence consists of mortgage related premium domain names that drive traffic to our brands.

In the years that I've known Bruce, I've found him to be a hugely energetic, highly focused marketing and sales executive who has a knack for increasing product visibility and demand. Bruce’s enthusiasm and drive are contagious, making him highly effective at building strong internal and external relationships. He has always been careful to foster the growth of people on his team, building their experience and guiding them to become better marketing professionals. In addition, his online marketing skills made sure that web pages we’re always at the top of the search engines – a huge credibility builder. Highly Recommend Bruce for your consideration.
